body: This is about the present. There is ZERO discrimination against women now in developed countries. Culture is solidly anti-male. A woman can do both what women do and what men do, she has a choice, both biologically and socially. Men have very few options, due to both biological and social factors, none of which are particularly great. And we're responsible for EVERYTHING and never allowed to open up about our problems. Some people will call you weak and unmanly and not worthy of respect, and others will harass you for "mansplaining". In fact, this is so great that if a man is a victim of a woman's crime, the man is almost always the one who gets arrested! And if they do arrest the woman, she gets like 1/6th of the punishment the man would.
body_html: This is about the present. There is ZERO discrimination against women now in developed countries. Culture is solidly anti-male. A woman can do both what women do and what men do, she has a choice, both biologically and socially. Men have very few options, due to both biological and social factors, none of which are particularly great. And we're responsible for EVERYTHING and never allowed to open up about our problems. Some people will call you weak and unmanly and not worthy of respect, and others will harass you for "mansplaining". In fact, this is so great that if a man is a victim of a woman's crime, the man is almost always the one who gets arrested! And if they do arrest the woman, she gets like 1/6th of the punishment the man would.

body: Women don't even have to get a fucking job if they don't want to, they can just leech off of their fathers or husbands and do whatever they want while he works all day long. Even though she probably has way more talents and career options than he does. And if she does get a job it's an easy, part time one in a subject of her interest, while the man has to work his butt off at some boring and likely hard job and pay all the bills, then come home and solve everyone elses' problems while holding his own problems in. That's just the natural order, unless you live in a tyrannical society where might is right nature doesn't give a single shit about you if you have a Y chromosome.

body:
"Other talents" mostly meaning "whoring" or "bullshitting." In an identity obsessed, morally bankrupt, consumerist society there are endless opportunities for women to make money simply by exploiting gender bias.

Why would they want to work hard when they can make more money, talking, lying or *pretending* to do shit?

body: So women actually have superior mental abilities, but due to the way society works and how coddled they are they end up doing exactly this. Because they can. Unfortunately this cannot simply go away, there are deep rooted biological instincts that are why women are so cared about and men are expected to take on everything and sacrifice themselves (not that this is a bad thing but it's pretty rough when it becomes your whole life, especially when no one warned you to expect it). Even people who hate this situation, like me, still instinctively act neglectful towards men while being caring toward women. Even mothers are more likely to ignore their crying infants if they're boys, simply because they're boys. It's very sad. The nurturer has to have a rich and happy personal life and possess many talents, but for the slave and warrior it does not matter and in fact being miserable helps them do the latter role better.

Unfortunately this cannot simply go away, there are deep rooted biological instincts that are why women are so cared about and men are expected to take on everything and sacrifice themselves (not that this is a bad thing but it's pretty rough when it becomes your whole life, especially when no one warned you to expect it). Even people who hate this situation, like me, still instinctively act neglectful towards men while being caring toward women. Even mothers are more likely to ignore their crying infants if they're boys, simply because they're boys. It's very sad. The nurturer has to have a rich and happy personal life and possess many talents, but for the slave and warrior it does not matter and in fact being miserable helps them do the latter role better.

body:
>So women actually have superior mental abilities,

You've been propagandized by the church of academia. Women perform better only by a standard set by feminized institutions. Their "superior" brains are wired to percieve reality in simplistic symbols: language and iconography, which they react to and express emotionally, often to the detriment of themselves and others. This makes them more culturally programmable and subject to delusion as well as more expressive.

They are completely dependent on society, which is ultimately dependant on men... Their disposition is either compliant or parasitic. Parasites are not at all superior to the host, they are simply evolved to subvert.
body_html:
So women actually have superior mental abilities,

You've been propagandized by the church of academia. Women perform better only by a standard set by feminized institutions. Their "superior" brains are wired to percieve reality in simplistic symbols: language and iconography, which they react to and express emotionally, often to the detriment of themselves and others. This makes them more culturally programmable and subject to delusion as well as more expressive.

They are completely dependent on society, which is ultimately dependant on men... Their disposition is either compliant or parasitic. Parasites are not at all superior to the host, they are simply evolved to subvert.

author.bio: I suffer from the heartbreak of re-revitiligo. A tragic congenital condition that causes my skin to be deficient in soul giving melanin, making me appear pale and lifeless, like a caucasian.

body:
Only if they enslave themselves.

The men don't actually need the approval of women. Women *require* male attention.

Which is why destroying the nuclear family is so important. To castrate patriarchal authority. They want the parental model of authority to be female, for children to associate femininity with power, which is why people believe that women are superior to men.

Its called "the women are wonderful effect" and it starts with being gestated inside a woman's uterus and then with constant social reminder that mother is "home" and that all males are interlopers or monsters, including yourself... its a delusion, not the reality.

Its called "the women are wonderful effect" and it starts with being gestated inside a woman's uterus and then with constant social reminder that mother is "home" and that all males are interlopers or monsters, including yourself... its a delusion, not the reality.

parent.body: No, they have superior brains precisely *because* they depend on society and men. The men are providers and this is the low class dirtywork that doesn't need much brains nor a good inner experience. Men=slaves.

body: Actually single women are happier than single men (it probably comes down to how much higher the male sex drive is). Fighting the third wave feminist bullshit doesn't mean you have to go anti-woman, it means you go pro-equality. Male issues can't ever get worked on if no one recognizes them, and that's pretty hard when some people say men are perfect and faultless creatures and most of the others call it mansplaining.

body:
Single women are happier because they live in a society that coddles and reassures them...

Society coddles and reassures them because otherwise they never stop crying, and in our current culture not giving in to female demands is considered "abuse"...

Men are culturally programmed to hate themselves and revere the feminine. Our whole society is leaning towards a reactionary inversion of civilized values.

body:
This is the result of primal urges. The female has the valuable uterus which can reproduce. The male only has the expendable genitals and just one can produce an infinite number of children. So naturally, both males and females are designed with the benefit of the female in mind, never the male. This is why females are so coddled and protected, and males hate themselves and revere them. Because females hold what's valuable and scare, and so everything biological is designed around them. The male's only value is in what he can do for the female, while hers in inherent and unconditional.

Even under the oppression of men, society has always operated this way at a basic level. Husbands always went to work while their wives enjoyed the fruits of their labor. Women and children have always been first. A girl throwing a tantrum has always been valid while a boy doing the exact same thing has always been a spoiled brat. Girls have always been able to get away with way more than boys. A woman being abused has always been a cause for concern and grief, and a man being abused has always been no big deal. All responsibility, guilt, and hardship is placed on the males, and all rewards and comfort are given to the female. At a primal level, people are simply more empathetic towards females and not so much with males: because our brains see girls as cute and innocent and boys as lazy violent ugly perverts. It's just an unintended consequence of reproductive design.
body_html:
This is the result of primal urges. The female has the valuable uterus which can reproduce. The male only has the expendable genitals and just one can produce an infinite number of children. So naturally, both males and females are designed with the benefit of the female in mind, never the male. This is why females are so coddled and protected, and males hate themselves and revere them. Because females hold what's valuable and scare, and so everything biological is designed around them. The male's only value is in what he can do for the female, while hers in inherent and unconditional.

Even under the oppression of men, society has always operated this way at a basic level. Husbands always went to work while their wives enjoyed the fruits of their labor. Women and children have always been first. A girl throwing a tantrum has always been valid while a boy doing the exact same thing has always been a spoiled brat. Girls have always been able to get away with way more than boys. A woman being abused has always been a cause for concern and grief, and a man being abused has always been no big deal. All responsibility, guilt, and hardship is placed on the males, and all rewards and comfort are given to the female. At a primal level, people are simply more empathetic towards females and not so much with males: because our brains see girls as cute and innocent and boys as lazy violent ugly perverts. It's just an unintended consequence of reproductive design.
